sentence.Network_en: It took him a while to accustom himself to the idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 他过了一段时间才习惯这个想法.

sentence.Network_en: It'shouldn't take long to accustom your students to working in groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的学生应该很快就会习惯分组学习的.

sentence.Network_en: She could not accustom herself to a hot climate.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不能使自己习惯于炎热的气候.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French acostumer, from a- (from Latin ad 'to, at') + costume 'custom'

entry.def: If you accustom yourself or another person to something, you make yourself or them become used to it.

example.ex: The team has accustomed itself to the pace of first division rugby...
example.tran: 球队适应了英式橄榄球甲级联赛的节奏。

example.ex: Shakespeare has accustomed us to a mixture of humor and tragedy in the same play.
example.tran: 莎士比亚让我们习见了同一场戏目中的悲喜交错。

means.word_mean: 1. make psychologically or physically used (to something);

sentences.sentence: "She became habituated to the background music"

auth_sentence.content: Time to accustom myself to our new relations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Time to accustom myself to our new relations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Time to accustom myself to our new relations.

auth_sentence.content: The eyes accustom themselves to twilight and discern the shapes of things in a room.
auth_sentence.res_content: The eyes accustom themselves to twilight and discern the shapes of things in a room.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The eyes accustom themselves to twilight and discern the shapes of things in a room.

auth_sentence.content: Will the next generation not accustom itself to the idea that marriage can be between two people of the same sex?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will the next generation not accustom itself to the idea that marriage can be between two people of the same sex?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will the next generation not accustom itself to the idea that marriage can be between two people of the same sex?

stems_affixes.word_buile: custom习惯+er人→习惯[进商店]的人

Sentence.sentence: Students who are accustomed to living in dorms.

sentences.en: It shouldn’t take long to accustom your students to working in groups.
sentences.cn: 你的学生应该很快就会习惯分组学习的。

sentences.en: You must learn to accustom yourself to hard work.
sentences.cn: 你必须学会习惯于艰苦的工作。

sentences.en: She could not accustom herself to a hot climate.
sentences.cn: 她不能使自己习惯于炎热的气候。

sentences.en: We had to accustom ourselves to cold weather.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使自己适应寒冷天气。

sentences.en: You must accustom yourself to getting up early.
It took him a while to accustom himself to the idea.
sentences.cn: 他过了一段时间才习惯这个想法。

sentences.en: It took a while for her eyes to accustom themselves to the dark.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛过了一会儿才适应了黑暗。
